attributes.action: Encourage the use of cycle in the capital and scrap enforced removal of cycles from public areas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: TfL and the boroughs are jointly lobbying for new powers in a private bill. Should the new laws be approved, councils will for the first time be legally empowered to seize cycles without warning.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
